about_me.des: BitReserve (a.k.a BR) is a Singapore based Foundation registered on (日期). BR is a civil oriented, multi-nation crypto currency organization, committed to breaking the monopoly of tradional centralized cooperations in the financial sector, and to satisfy end users need in financial applications by providing them a more fair, more convenient, and more secure environment. The core of the BR foundation is to establish and maintain a global-wise stable crypto currency, CUSD, and to develop CUSD supporters on a global scale to make CUSD the most influencial stable coin through the world, which could be further utilized by global end users as a secure and stable fincial application tool.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.imgkit: IMGKit is a Python 2/3 library which wrapper wkhtmltoimage utility to convert HTML to image using Webkit, input can be URLs, HTML files and string.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.
projects.familycode: This is a shopping mall in wechat, it promotes gene detection. Since time is precious, I write this website with Django, jQuery, weui. This is WuxiNextcode's major product. You can scan project's picture by wechat.
projects.ztool: Z-Tool is a personal project for myself, we can use PC/WeChat to query some information. Front end is written by VueJS/WeChat mini app framework, backend API is written by Flask.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
